testcase.classname: User stories prepared in the project
testcase.name: The User can select performances using calendar shortcuts instead of date picker
testcase.system-out: Given website "https://www.bilesuparadize.lv/lv/" is opened.................passed When dropdown "calendar" is opened..........................................passed And date option "next 14 days" is selected..................................passed Then shows are filtered for next 14 days....................................passed

testcase.classname: User stories prepared in the project
testcase.name: The User can select performances using calendar date picker
testcase.system-out: Given website "https://www.bilesuparadize.lv/lv/" is opened.................passed And dropdown "events" is opened.............................................passed And event option "all events" is selected...................................passed When events are filtered by "first day of next month".......................passed Then events filtered by "first day of next month" are shown.................passed
